    • Constructor Detail

      • ConfigurationReloadEvent

        public ConfigurationReloadEvent(Object source,
                                Name configurationName,
                                int action)
        Created a new event to be fired when a configuration object is loaded, reloaded or deleted.
        Parameters:
        source - source
        configurationName - Could be a session or application name
        action - Reload action. Can be either OBJECT_LOADED, OBJECT_RELOADED or OBJECT_DELETED

    • Method Detail

      • getAction

        public int getAction()
        Returns:
        The action for that even. Can be either OBJECT_LOADED, OBJECT_RELOADED or OBJECT_DELETED
